metadata.name: Jim Jones, Hip Hop Legend
metadata.description:
**Jim Jones** is a Hip Hop Icon, Television Star, Entrepreneur, and Entertainment Mogul. He is one of the founding members of The Diplomats. His current companies include Saucey Extracts, Vamp Fit, Capo-Coin, VL-mobile communication service, Vampire Life Clothing. He is dedicated to various humanitarian efforts and has displayed his affinity for giving back to the inner city youth community through VAMP Cares. 

This amazing NFT comes with 2 VIP backstage passes for an upcoming Jim Jones concert. Owners will be invited to a meet and greet with Jim and will be able to take selfies. 

NFT presented with high resolution images of both front and back of the collectible card along with interactive 3D animation. 

Images shot in Waturbury, CT by Idris Erba. 

Link to front of card: https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmScKWWNoN3hs8W9tFCUc4eAKQoA7AJLdcV9hknK958STa/legend03_01_f.png 

Link to back of card: https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmScKWWNoN3hs8W9tFCUc4eAKQoA7AJLdcV9hknK958STa/legend03_01_b.png
